title: F&B Operations Optimization
problem: Fragmented sales data from multiple outlets led to poor inventory and staff planning.
intervention: Developed a unified data dashboard and AI model for demand forecasting.
outcome: Reduced food wastage by 15% and optimized staff scheduling, leading to a 20% increase in labor efficiency.

title: Manufacturing OEE Insights
problem: Manual machine data logging resulted in inaccurate Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) metrics.
intervention: Implemented an IoT sensor-based system to automatically collect and analyze real-time machine data.
outcome: Improved OEE visibility by 40%, identifying bottlenecks that led to a 10% increase in throughput.

title: SME Financial Forecasting
problem: Reliance on manual, spreadsheet-based financial tracking from Tally and GSTN data.
intervention: Created a secure pipeline to ingest data and apply predictive models for cash flow forecasting.
outcome: Provided a clear 12-month financial outlook, enabling proactive budget management and strategic investment decisions.
